description:
A Cat`s Characteristics
Two cats have joined the Kamohara family. The male Tora likes to do things at his own pace. The female Kiku has a good relationship with Dad. One day, Dad ate Kiku`s food, and strange things start to happen.
Field Trip
Fumi, who has moved on to the first grade is on her first field trip. Kanna, Yuki, cool looking Masa, and bad Takashi are having fun in the bus as usual, but thirty minutes later, something happens...
Complete
Mr. Mizunuma who is in charge of Mom`s publication, is a figure collector. As he is not able to keep them at home, he asks Mom to put them at her work place, and...
Unpokopi
Right now, Bunji and his school mates are into the Unpoko dance. It was first done by a TV comedy show, but it somehow has managed to get into the elementary school and right now it`s a huge trend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cat`s Characteristics / Field Trip / Complete / Unpokopi
ネコの性格 / バス遠足 / コンプリート / ウンポコピー
